function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased employment rates for immigrants in certain countries","Impact":"Could lead to increased contact and interaction between immigrants and native-born individuals, potentially contributing to the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement measures to ensure proper hygiene, sanitation, and social distancing in workplaces and public spaces","Technologies":"Contact tracing technology, workplace ventilation systems, and sanitation equipment","People":"Immigrants, native-born individuals, general public","Owner":"Government, employers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Emigration of immigrants from certain European OECD countries","Impact":"Loss of individuals with weaker labor market attachment, potentially contributing to economic and social instability","Mitigation":"Develop policies to support immigrant integration and retention, and address factors driving emigration","Technologies":"Immigrant integration programs, economic support initiatives, and social integration platforms","People":"Immigrants, local communities, government","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Large declines in employment for both immigrants and native-born individuals in Colombia and Chile","Impact":"Economic and social impact on both immigrant and native-born populations, with potential implications for overall public health and well-being","Mitigation":"Implement targeted support programs for unemployed individuals, including access to healthcare and social services","Technologies":"Online job platforms, telehealth services, and support networks","People":"Immigrants, native-born individuals, unemployed individuals","Owner":"Government, social service organizations"}]}
